It might not feel like it, but Halloween season is nearly here — just ask HomeGoods. And while you might have your air conditioning working overtime right now, fantasizing about the cozy fall future might bring an imaginary breeze (and some cute Halloween home decor!). 

Well, HomeGoods just rolled out a new collection of Halloween decor, including a few ghost-shaped pillows that may look familiar. Remember the ghost pillows Target carried for Halloween last year? HomeGoods rolled out their version, and these have viral potential.

TikTok user @flashesofstyle posted a video sharing a few of their recent Halloween finds from HomeGoods, including candles, blankets, glassware, and fluffy plush ghost pillows that resemble ones sold by Target last year. 

“Halloween girls run to HomeGoods for CODE ORANGE,” @flashesofstyle wrote in a TikTok caption. “HomeGoods Halloween is here and everything is just so cute.”

HomeGoods’ Halloween Selection Is So Cute

The ghost pillows at HomeGoods are made with what appears to be super-soft faux fur, and they seem to come in sets of two. They’re smiling and “boo-ing,” and some even have little bows in their hair and blushing cheeks. And shoppers were quick to run to their local HomeGoods: “Got a cart full already,” one person joked in the comment section of the TikTok video. 

These HomeGoods options look like they could be cousins to the Target ghost pillow from last year. In fact, these pillows are still available to shop online, but only in the neon colors that were part of last year’s Halloween Hyde & EEK! Boutique collection.

HomeGoods also has a white plush pumpkin pillow and numerous fun versions of the viral ghost blanket that took the internet by storm a couple of years ago. Plush ghosts aren’t going anywhere (and thank goodness for that)!

If your HomeGoods doesn’t already have Halloween decor in stock and you just can’t wait to get your hands on one of these cuties, check out Marshalls’ website, where a similar version is currently available to buy.

Halloween can never come too early. In fact, let’s kick off Summerween right now with these charming little pillows!
